text: Are you alright, Pell? You've been asleep for days!
speaker: hero1

text: So you can't see anything, aye? Another gift from the Awakening. Just be grateful you have both feet.
speaker: hero1

text: How's your healing ability? Any good?
speaker: hero1

text: Let's see if you know how to handle yourself in a fight.
speaker: hero1

text: Remember how to rotate? Press the left or right arrow key to rotate yourself.
speaker: hero1

text: Each rotation is 45 degrees, rotate 8 times to make a complete circle.
speaker: hero1

text: These tricky bastards like to spawn wherever fancies them. I'll take them out, but you make sure to heal me!
speaker: hero1

text: You won't be able to hear me unless you face me. Rotate until you hear my voice louder!
speaker: hero1

text: Good. The better you can hear me, the closer you are to finding my location.
speaker: hero1

text: Press the 1 key to cast a healing spell.
speaker: hero1

text: Good, now I'm going to move to another place, keep rotating to heal me.
speaker: hero1

text: You got the basics down. Let's see how you do on a real adventure.
speaker: hero1

text: Nice shooting! I thought we were done for there.
speaker: hero1

text: Nice shooting! I thought we were done for there.
speaker: hero1
